scripts.app: concurrently -n fe,be -c yellow,blue "npm run backend" "npm run client"
scripts.app2: concurrently -n fe,be,stt -c yellow,blue,green "npm run backend" "npm run client" "npm run agent"
scripts.agent:mac: cd pip_frontend && python3 closepulse_agent.py --ws ws://127.0.0.1:8000 --ext EXT_FIXED_ID --mic 'MacBook Pro-Mikrofon' --lang de
scripts.agent:win: cd pip_frontend && python closepulse_agent.py --ws ws://127.0.0.1:8000 --ext EXT_FIXED_ID --mic "Stereo Mix" --lang de
scripts.mic:mac: lsof | grep CoreAudio | grep -i Python | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
